S.FORM: 'inavayan! pungsalra ta lra!
'inavayan! pongsalra ta lra!
katikedir! sungar!
katikedir! songar!
Sinsi! 'inavayan!
Sinsi! 'inavayan!
kayan diya.
kayan diya.
'inavayan! pananadam ku harem kaninmu mapiya da kumuda marengay kana "akanen" na Kasavakan.
'inavayan! pananadam ko harem kaninmo mapiya da komoda marengay kana "akanen" na Kasavakan.
S.TRANSL: 大家好。今天老師要教大家食物的建和語怎麼說。
Hello everyone. Today I am going to teach you how to say \\\food\\\" in Kasavakan."

S.FORM: madalram u kinger kanangku ngai?
madalram o kinger kanangko ngai?
S.TRANSL: Do you understand what I’m saying?

S.FORM: Sinsi, ma'ulid ku, karuwa u diya masalr marengay?
Sinsi, ma'olid ko, karowa o diya masalr marengay?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我不懂。你可以再說一次嗎?
I don’t understand. Can you repeat it again?

S.FORM: adi ku kinger, katamuniyu diya marengay.
adi ko kinger, katamoniyo diya marengay.
S.TRANSL: 我聽不到，請再大聲一點說話。
I can’t hear you, please speak louder.

S.FORM: na'uwi diya kani! itulusay ku diya miyup.
na'owi diya kani! itolosay ko diya miyop.
S.TRANSL: 請看這裡! 跟著我唸一遍。
Look here, please! Repeat after me.

S.FORM: mm. 'inavu nu iniyup.
mm. 'inavo no iniyop.
asalru diya miyup. katamuniyu diya.
asalro diya miyop. katamoniyo diya.
S.TRANSL: Read it again. Please speak louder.

S.FORM: parepengan, amana marengay.
parepengan, amana marengay.
pupanayu diya na valray.
popanayo diya na valray.
ai sinsi.
ai sinsi.
pupanayu diya na impic.
popanayo diya na impic.
Sinsi, malalup ku minada da impic.
Sinsi, malalop ko minada da impic.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: pupanayu diya na aicur.
popanayo diya na aicor.
Sinsi, malalup ku minada da aicur.
Sinsi, malalop ko minada da aicor.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my eraser.

S.FORM: kivuras diya kananu ngidilan na lralrang.
kivoras diya kanano ngidilan na lralrang.
S.TRANSL: 請跟旁邊同學借橡皮擦。
Please borrow erasers from your classmates.

S.FORM: pavurasay ku diya da aicur ay?
pavorasay ko diya da aicor ay?
talaulep ta lra.
talaolep ta lra.
ta palruway lra kani, nu masalr diya saliyusan marepana'uwa ta diya.
ta palroway lra kani, no masalr diya saliyosan marepana'owa ta diya.
S.TRANSL: 我們就上到這邊，下週再見。
Class dismissed, see you next week.

S.FORM: i iman u?
i iman o?
i Kimsuy ku.
i Kimsoy ko.
i iman u?
i iman o?
alrak ku ni Maysang. i Kimsuy ku ngadan.
alrak ko ni Maysang. i Kimsoy ko ngadan.
S.TRANSL: I am Maysang’s son, my name is Kimsay.

S.FORM: i iman u?
i iman o?
temakakesi ku kani sinsi Maysang. i Kimsuy ku ngadan.
temakakesi ko kani sinsi Maysang. i Kimsoy ko ngadan.
S.TRANSL: I’m a student in Maysang, my name is Kimsuy.

S.FORM: i iman nu ngadan?
i iman no ngadan?
i Saki ku ngadan.
i Saki ko ngadan.
i iman nantu ngadan ni temama?
i iman nanto ngadan ni temama?
i Selay nantu ngadan ni malri.
i Selay nanto ngadan ni malri.
i iman intaw?
i iman intaw?
i Tahala intaw.
i Tahala intaw.
i valri intaw, i Tahala tu ngadan.
i valri intaw, i Tahala to ngadan.
S.TRANSL: He is my brother, his name is Tahala.

S.FORM: i iman tu ngadan?
i iman to ngadan?
i Tahala tu ngadan.
i Tahala to ngadan.
i Maysang nantu ngadan?
i Maysang nanto ngadan?
ai, i Maysang nantu ngadan.
ai, i Maysang nanto ngadan.
i Maysang nantu ngadan?
i Maysang nanto ngadan?
melri, i Kulas nantu ngadan.
melri, i Kolas nanto ngadan.
i iman idiyu na cau?
i iman idiyo na cao?
i Tapunik intaw, ningku lra taina.
i Taponik intaw, ningko lra taina.
i iman idiyu na cau?
i iman idiyo na cao?
nangku ngidayan intaw, i Muymuy tu ngadan.
nangko ngidayan intaw, i Moymoy to ngadan.
S.TRANSL: 她是我的朋友，她的名字是Muymuy。
She’s a friend of mine, her name is Muymuy.

S.FORM: pidaya lra nanu 'ami harem?
pidaya lra nano 'ami harem?
mukecep ku 'ami harem.
mokecep ko 'ami harem.
pidaya lra tu 'ami harem?
pidaya lra to 'ami harem?
mukecep misama' da duwaya tu 'ami harem.
mokecep misama' da dowaya to 'ami harem.
pulu' duwa tu 'ami harem.
polo' dowa to 'ami harem.
pidaya lra tu 'ami ni temama harem?
pidaya lra to 'ami ni temama harem?
makalruwac tu 'ami ni malri harem.
makalrowac to 'ami ni malri harem.
papida mu maruwadiyadi?
papida mo marowadiyadi?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: ulra daduwa ku iva, di sasa ku wadi.
olra dadowa ko iva, di sasa ko wadi.
S.TRANSL: 我有兩個兄姐，一個弟妹。
I have two brothers and sisters and one younger brother and sister.

S.FORM: ulra nu iva?
olra no iva?
uniyan ku da iva.
oniyan ko da iva.
papida mu cauwan i ruma'?
papida mo caowan i roma'?
S.TRANSL: How many people are in your family?

S.FORM: aapat mi i ruma'.
aapat mi i roma'.
S.TRANSL: There are four of us in our family.

S.FORM: temakakesi u i iyan?
temakakesi o i iyan?
temakakesi ku i kalingko.
temakakesi ko i kalingko.
i iman intaw?
i iman intaw?
i ama na maralrak kani malri intaw.
i ama na maralrak kani malri intaw.
aeman tu kiyakarunan ni ama na maralrak kani temama?
aeman to kiyakaronan ni ama na maralrak kani temama?
S.TRANSL: 你的叔叔從事什麼工作?
What does your uncle do for a living?

S.FORM: Kinsas intaw.
Kinsas intaw.
i iman idiyu na cau?
i iman idiyo na cao?
mau i valri na vavayan intaw.
mao i valri na vavayan intaw.
ulra tu kiyakarunan ni vau?
olra to kiyakaronan ni vao?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister have a job?

S.FORM: kiyakarun i biyoing.
kiyakaron i biyoing.
maruwadi nadu na daduwa?
marowadi nado na dadowa?
S.TRANSL: 他們兩個人是兄弟姐妹嗎?

S.FORM: melri, mare'aliyan nadu.
melri, mare'aliyan nado.
a Yuēncumin u?
a Yoēncomin o?
ai, a pinuyumayan ku.
ai, a pinoyomayan ko.
pinuyumayan i turuma'anu?
pinoyomayan i toroma'ano?
ai, a pinuyumayan intaw.
ai, a pinoyomayan intaw.
S.TRANSL: Yes, she's from the Puyuma tribe.

S.FORM: tihasar i temama?
tihasar i temama?
ai, tihasar mi saruma'enan.
ai, tihasar mi saroma'enan.
S.TRANSL: Yes, we are all very tall.

S.FORM: temakakesi lra i wadiyu?
temakakesi lra i wadiyo?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister go to school?

S.FORM: ai, temakakesi lra intaw.
ai, temakakesi lra intaw.
sayhu marengay kananta ngai na wadiyu?
sayho marengay kananta ngai na wadiyo?
S.TRANSL: Do your siblings speak the language?

S.FORM: ai sayhu marengay nadu.
ai sayho marengay nado.
papida mu maruwadiyadi?
papida mo marowadiyadi?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: tatelu mi maruwadiyadi.
tatelo mi marowadiyadi.
S.TRANSL: I have three brothers and sisters.

S.FORM: mukasa u kikadu kani temama di tayna?
mokasa o kikado kani temama di tayna?
S.TRANSL: 你和爸爸媽媽一起住嗎?
Do you live with your parents?

S.FORM: ai, mukasa ku kikadu kani malri di nani.
ai, mokasa ko kikado kani malri di nani.
S.TRANSL: 是，我和爸爸媽媽一起住。
Yes, I live with my mom and dad.

S.FORM: mukasa u kikadu kana temu?
mokasa o kikado kana temo?
S.TRANSL: 你和爺爺奶奶一起住嗎?
Do you live with your grandparents?

S.FORM: adi, adi ku mukasa kikadu kanadu.
adi, adi ko mokasa kikado kanado.
S.TRANSL: 不，我沒和跟他們一起住。
No, I didn't live with them.

S.FORM: mukasa u kani iman kikadu?
mokasa o kani iman kikado?
mukasa ku kikadu kani malri di nani di valri na ma'inay.
mokasa ko kikado kani malri di nani di valri na ma'inay.
S.TRANSL: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥住在一起。
I live with my father, mother and brother.

S.FORM: kemay i iyan u?
kemay i iyan o?
kemay Takaw ku.
kemay Takaw ko.
ulra i iyan nu ruma'?
olra i iyan no roma'?
ulra i Kalēngko naniyam ruma'.
olra i Kalēngko naniyam roma'.
ulra i iyan nanu dekalr?
olra i iyan nano dekalr?
ulra i Kalēngko ku dekalr.
olra i Kalēngko ko dekalr.
ulra i iyan nanmu dekalr?
olra i iyan nanmo dekalr?
ulra i Kalēngko naniyam dekalr.
olra i Kalēngko naniyam dekalr.
nu aidan lra muruma' u i dekalr?
no aidan lra moroma' o i dekalr?
S.TRANSL: 你什麼時候會回去部落?
When are you going back to the tribe?

S.FORM: nu kasede'an diya nu derun mu, muruma' ku.
no kasede'an diya no deron mo, moroma' ko.
S.TRANSL: I will go back in the summer.

S.FORM: a alrak ku da Pinuyumayan.
a alrak ko da Pinoyomayan.
kumuda na wari harem?
komoda na wari harem?
makadaw lra, vi'as na wari.
makadaw lra, vi'as na wari.
S.TRANSL: The sun is coming out, it's very hot.

S.FORM: aretid i pacaran?
aretid i pacaran?
S.TRANSL: Is it going to be cold outside?

S.FORM: aretid, puwapuwayi mikavang.
aretid, powapowayi mikavang.
S.TRANSL: It's cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: vi'as i pacaran?
vi'as i pacaran?
adi, valiyan lra.
adi, valiyan lra.
kumuda na wari harem?
komoda na wari harem?
adi aretid di adi vi'as, penauwa.
adi aretid di adi vi'as, penaowa.
S.TRANSL: 今天不冷也不熱，剛剛好。
It's neither cold nor hot today, just right.

S.FORM: kumuda na wari harem kana karauv?
komoda na wari harem kana karaov?
uniyan da runev i rukup, mupacalan lra na vitu'en.
oniyan da ronev i rokop, mopacalan lra na vito'en.
S.TRANSL: 天空沒有雲，星星出來了。
There were no clouds in the sky; the stars came out.

S.FORM: kumuda na wari i pacaran?
komoda na wari i pacaran?
maudiya ikadiyadi na 'udalr, mupacaran lra na tara'
maodiya ikadiyadi na 'odalr, mopacaran lra na tara'
S.TRANSL: 雨剛剛停，出了太陽，彩虹出來了。
The rain has just stopped, the sun has come out, the rainbow is coming out.

S.FORM: kumuda na wari harem kanmu i kadu?
komoda na wari harem kanmo i kado?
S.TRANSL: 你們那裡現在的天氣如何?
What's the weather like where you are?

S.FORM: pacev na vali kani a!
pacev na vali kani a!
S.TRANSL: We're going to have a big storm here.

S.FORM: 'inava na wari kanmu i kadu?
'inava na wari kanmo i kado?
'inava, ma'idang na kadaw.
'inava, ma'idang na kadaw.
S.TRANSL: Very well, out of the big sun.

S.FORM: yawa ku i kungkuwan.
yawa ko i kongkowan.
S.TRANSL: I have to go to school.

S.FORM: aretid na wari, pikavang da sadu.
aretid na wari, pikavang da sado.
S.TRANSL: The weather is very cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: uwapacaaran ku lra.
owapacaaran ko lra.
'a'udalr da pacev nu maremay, ikalaalup minada da suku.
'a'odalr da pacev no maremay, ikalaalop minada da soko.
S.TRANSL: 等一下會下大雨，你要記得帶傘。
It's going to rain heavily, you have to remember to bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: 'a'udalr diyamaw?
'a'odalr diyamaw?
demaderung a haremay, 'a'udalr lra nu maremay.
demaderong a haremay, 'a'odalr lra no maremay.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛打雷了，等一下應該就會下雨。
There was thunder just now, and it's supposed to rain later.

S.FORM: ma'udalr diyamaw?
ma'odalr diyamaw?
'umudalr haremay, madiyadi lra na 'udalr harem.
'omodalr haremay, madiyadi lra na 'odalr harem.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛有下雨，現在雨停了。
It just rained, and now it's stopped.

S.FORM: ma'udalr lra?
ma'odalr lra?
sapene' i dadalan, kemawan 'inudalr lra.
sapene' i dadalan, kemawan 'inodalr lra.
S.TRANSL: 好像下過雨了，馬路是濕的。
It seems to have rained and the road is wet.

S.FORM: 'umudalr diyamaw? kumuda di talrunger u?
'omodalr diyamaw? komoda di talronger o?
S.TRANSL: 有下雨嗎?你怎麼全身都濕了?
Is it raining? Why are you all wet?

S.FORM: 'ema'udalr i pacaran, adi ku miinada da suku.
'ema'odalr i pacaran, adi ko miinada da soko.
S.TRANSL: 外面在下雨，我沒有帶雨傘。
It's raining outside, so I didn't bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: 'inava u diya?
'inava o diya?
valiyan dadu, nana ku canguru' kana kurevari ku.
valiyan dado, nana ko cangoro' kana korevari ko.
S.TRANSL: The wind is blowing so hard that my head hurts.

S.FORM: 'inava u diya?
'inava o diya?
ma'idang na kadaw, mapungaw ku kana kurkadaw ku.
ma'idang na kadaw, mapongaw ko kana korkadaw ko.
S.TRANSL: 太陽好大，曬得我頭好暈。
The sun is so big, it makes me dizzy.

S.FORM: malalup ku minada da impic.
malalop ko minada da impic.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: ku paverasay u.
ko paverasay o.
malalup ku minada da 'aracip.
malalop ko minada da 'aracip.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my chopsticks.

S.FORM: adi ku miinada, kayta cimima'.
adi ko miinada, kayta cimima'.
S.TRANSL: I don't have one either, let's go buy one.

S.FORM: kayta cimima' da impic ay?
kayta cimima' da impic ay?
S.TRANSL: Let's go buy a pen, shall we?

S.FORM: ai, cacima' ku diya da aicur.
ai, cacima' ko diya da aicor.
S.TRANSL: Well, I still have to buy erasers.

S.FORM: kayta cimima' da kenanamain ay?
kayta cimima' da kenanamain ay?
S.TRANSL: Let's go get breakfast, shall we?

S.FORM: inau, mekan ku lra i ruma'.
inao, mekan ko lra i roma'.
S.TRANSL: No, I've already eaten at home.

S.FORM: malalup ku parevi'as daku putavuwan.
malalop ko parevi'as dako potavowan.
uwa kadikayu parevi'as.
owa kadikayo parevi'as.
malalup ku minada da putavuwan.
malalop ko minada da potavowan.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my lunchbox.

S.FORM: mukasaya ta mekan nu kemadu!
mokasaya ta mekan no kemado!
S.TRANSL: 那我們一起吃我的便當吧!
Then let's eat my lunch box together!

S.FORM: yaakan u da eman nu kare'alriyan?
yaakan o da eman no kare'alriyan?
S.TRANSL: What do you want to eat for lunch?

S.FORM: yaakan ku kanantu parkare'a'alri kanta i kungkuwan.
yaakan ko kananto parkare'a'alri kanta i kongkowan.
S.TRANSL: 我要吃學校的營養午餐。
I want a nutritious school lunch.

S.FORM: kare'a'alri u da eman?
kare'a'alri o da eman?
S.TRANSL: What do you want to eat for lunch?

S.FORM: miinada ku da putavuwan, mukasaya ta mekan nu kemadu!
miinada ko da potavowan, mokasaya ta mekan no kemado!
S.TRANSL: 我今天有帶便當，我們中午一起吃吧!
I've brought a lunchbox today, let's eat together at noon!

S.FORM: kayta malimaliya kana lanciyo ay?
kayta malimaliya kana lanciyo ay?
S.TRANSL: Let's go play basketball, shall we?

S.FORM: ai, anlra.
ai, anlra.
kayta cempuka kana yakiw ay?
kayta cempoka kana yakiw ay?
inau, takakesi ku.
inao, takakesi ko.
alakay ku diya kana idap.
alakay ko diya kana idap.
S.TRANSL: Please help me with the broom.

S.FORM: ai, niya ini na idap.
ai, niya ini na idap.
S.TRANSL: Okay, here's a broomstick for you.

S.FORM: alakay ku diya kana tuppu ay?
alakay ko diya kana toppo ay?
S.TRANSL: Can you get me a rag, please?

S.FORM: maidap ku, pakaruni i Tawala.
maidap ko, pakaroni i Tawala.
S.TRANSL: I was sweeping the floor, you asked Tawala to help you.

S.FORM: piya u lra midap?
piya o lra midap?
piya ku lra midap.
piya ko lra midap.
kumuda di adi u maidap?
komoda di adi o maidap?
piya ku lra midap.
piya ko lra midap.
milrica' i dadale', icuri diya.
milrica' i dadale', icori diya.
S.TRANSL: The floor is dirty, wipe it.

S.FORM: ai, kayku diya melaka da capulr.
ai, kayko diya melaka da capolr.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll go get the rag first.

S.FORM: milrica' idu na lataw, uwa icuri diya.
milrica' ido na lataw, owa icori diya.
S.TRANSL: 那個窗戶很髒，去擦一下。
That window is very dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: nu maremay lra, adi ku diya piya midap kani a!
no maremay lra, adi ko diya piya midap kani a!
S.TRANSL: 等一下，我這裡還沒打掃完。
Wait a minute, I'm not done cleaning up here.

S.FORM: kakuda u nu maremay?
kakoda o no maremay?
yawa ku maya'a kana sinsi.
yawa ko maya'a kana sinsi.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to see my teacher.

S.FORM: kakuda u nu muruma' kemay kungkuwan?
kakoda o no moroma' kemay kongkowan?
S.TRANSL: What do you do after school?

S.FORM: parelrang ku kani 'alilri yawa mi semenaya.
parelrang ko kani 'alilri yawa mi semenaya.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to sing with my friend.

S.FORM: kukuda intaw nu muruma' kemay kungkuwan?
kokoda intaw no moroma' kemay kongkowan?
yawa pakulimaya intaw.
yawa pakolimaya intaw.
kiumalra ku diya, ulra i ruma' i Lumi?
kiomalra ko diya, olra i roma' i Lomi?
S.TRANSL: May I ask if Lumi is home?

S.FORM: ulra i ruma', usavak diya.
olra i roma', osavak diya.
kiumalra ku diya, ulra i Lumi i ruma'?
kiomalra ko diya, olra i Lomi i roma'?
S.TRANSL: May I ask if Lumi is home?

S.FORM: uninyan i ruma', kakudau diyamaw?
oninyan i roma', kakodao diyamaw?
S.TRANSL: She's not here. What do you want?

S.FORM: i iman u diyamaw?
i iman o diyamaw?
imu, i Sanay ku, cuwalray ku diya.
imo, i Sanay ko, cowalray ko diya.
S.TRANSL: Grandpa, I'm Sanay, please open the door.

S.FORM: i iman u diyamaw?
i iman o diyamaw?
Kiku, i Muymuy ku duwa ku maya'a kannu kivangavang.
Kiko, i Moymoy ko dowa ko maya'a kanno kivangavang.
S.TRANSL: Kiku, I'm Muymuy and I've come to play with you.

S.FORM: sawariyan ta lra adi mena'u. a!
sawariyan ta lra adi mena'o. a!
ai, sare'ed ku kannu, kadika madayadayara ta.
ai, sare'ed ko kanno, kadika madayadayara ta.
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我很想念你。快來聊天吧!
Yeah! I miss you so much. Come on, let's chat!

S.FORM: kayan diya, 'au diya kana danum.
kayan diya, 'ao diya kana danom.
S.TRANSL: Please sit down and have some tea.

S.FORM: lrayuwan!
lrayowan!
'au diya kanini a!
'ao diya kanini a!
wa! kana imaran ini na 'a'awan a!
wa! kana imaran ini na 'a'awan a!
mekana ta da vuwa' nu kemadu.
mekana ta da vowa' no kemado.
ai ! kaimaramaran nu mena'u ta kanini na vuwa' a!
ai ! kaimaramaran no mena'o ta kanini na vowa' a!
S.TRANSL: 好喔!這些水果看起來很可口喔！

S.FORM: imaran na vuwa'?
imaran na vowa'?
ai tatena' da imaran.
ai tatena' da imaran.
piya lra demeru i nani, kayta mekana nu kemadu!
piya lra demero i nani, kayta mekana no kemado!
S.TRANSL: 媽媽晚餐煮好了，我們一道吃吧!
Mom's dinner is ready, let's eat together!

S.FORM: ai, mulasa ku diya kananku lima.
ai, molasa ko diya kananko lima.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll go wash my hands first.

S.FORM: kavuceker, amana maira, saruma'enan ta kema ta.
kavoceker, amana maira, saroma'enan ta kema ta.

makaiwan di lrowaca payso i kani.
puwapuwa ku diya, cimima', parepauwa da saleman paysu.
powapowa ko diya, cimima', parepaowa da saleman payso.
S.TRANSL: I'll buy some more, and make up 100 yuan.

S.FORM: lruwaca leman di mukecep paysu peniya.
lrowaca leman di mokecep payso peniya.
kaduruyu diya! karuwa lruwaca leman paysu ay?
kadoroyo diya! karowa lrowaca leman payso ay?
S.TRANSL: It's a bit cheaper! Can I have 500?

S.FORM: padangal dadu ini a, karuwa diya kemaduru?
padangal dado ini a, karowa diya kemadoro?
S.TRANSL: 這個太貴了，可以算便宜一點嗎?
It's too expensive, can you make it cheaper?

S.FORM: adi, maduru lra dadu ini a.
adi, madoro lra dado ini a.
S.TRANSL: 不行，這個已經很便宜了。
No, this is already very cheap.

S.FORM: 'aylra kanini na walru nu kemadu!
'aylra kanini na walro no kemado!
S.TRANSL: Then give me this packet of candy!

S.FORM: makatelun paysu ini na walru, ulra diya duma cacima'an?
makatelon payso ini na walro, olra diya doma cacima'an?
S.TRANSL: 這餅乾30元，還需要買別的東西嗎?
This cookie is $30, do you need to buy anything else?

S.FORM: uniyan lra. lrayuwan!
oniyan lra. lrayowan!
karuwa ku kiveras da paysu kannu?
karowa ko kiveras da payso kanno?
S.TRANSL: Can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: man adi diyamaw? kiyaveras u da pidaya?
man adi diyamaw? kiyaveras o da pidaya?
S.TRANSL: 哪裡不行? 你要借多少錢?

S.FORM: malalup ku minada da paysu, karuwa ku kiveras kannu?
malalop ko minada da payso, karowa ko kiveras kanno?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring the money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: yi! maresan ta adi ku miinada paysu!
yi! maresan ta adi ko miinada payso!
S.TRANSL: 喔！我們一樣，我也沒帶錢耶!
Oh! We're the same, and I don't have any money!

S.FORM: adi ku malalup minada da paysu, karuwa ku paveras kannu.
adi ko malalop minada da payso, karowa ko paveras kanno.
S.TRANSL: 我沒忘記帶錢，我可以借錢給你.
I didn't forget to bring money, I can lend you money.

S.FORM: inau, nanu kiniveras kaningku na paysu a adaman mu, adi u diya paveriyas kaning ku.
inao, nano kiniveras kaningko na payso a adaman mo, adi o diya paveriyas kaning ko.
S.TRANSL: 不要，上次借的錢你都還沒還我。
No, you haven't paid me back the money you borrowed last time.

S.FORM: karuwa ku kiveras kananu kavang?
karowa ko kiveras kanano kavang?
kemadu diyamaw? alaku.
kemado diyamaw? alako.
karuwa ku kiveras kananu valray?
karowa ko kiveras kanano valray?
ku paverasanay lra kani Saya.
ko paverasanay lra kani Saya.
paverasanay ku diya kananu dinsiya ay?
paverasanay ko diya kanano dinsiya ay?
S.TRANSL: 請借給我你的腳踏車好嗎?
Can I borrow your bicycle, please?

S.FORM: ai, aymu nu 'emanan paveriyasaw ku.
ai, aymo no 'emanan paveriyasaw ko.
S.TRANSL: Okay, but you have to give it back to me tomorrow.

S.FORM: ma'udalr lra, adi ku miinada da suku, paverasay ku diya a?
ma'odalr lra, adi ko miinada da soko, paverasay ko diya a?
S.TRANSL: 下雨了，我沒有帶傘，借我傘好嗎?
It's raining, I don't have an umbrella, can you lend me one?

S.FORM: sesaya ku suku di, mukasaya ta misuku nu kemadu.
sesaya ko soko di, mokasaya ta misoko no kemado.
S.TRANSL: 我只有一把傘，我們一起撐吧!
I only have an umbrella, let's stick together!

S.FORM: mau nanu ipaveras kaningku adaman ini na valray a, pavaveriyas ku lra kannu, lrayuwan!
mao nano ipaveras kaningko adaman ini na valray a, pavaveriyas ko lra kanno, lrayowan!
S.TRANSL: 這是你上次借我的書，還你了！謝謝你！
This is the book you borrowed from me last time, I'm returning it to you! Thank you!

S.FORM: maranger u diya mena'u da kumuda na valray, rengayaw ku lra.
maranger o diya mena'o da komoda na valray, rengayaw ko lra.
S.TRANSL: 你還想看什麼書都可以跟我說。
You can tell me what else you want to read.

S.FORM: pavaveriyas ku lra nu aydan kanu da paysu?
pavaveriyas ko lra no aydan kano da payso?
S.TRANSL: When do I have to pay you back?

S.FORM: kakuda! nu mipaysu u lra nu aydan mu, na'uwi lra.
kakoda! no mipayso o lra no aydan mo, na'owi lra.
S.TRANSL: 沒關係，你有錢的時候再說。
It's okay, you can talk about it when you have money.

S.FORM: pavaveriyas u lra nu aydan kaningku na paysu?
pavaveriyas o lra no aydan kaningko na payso?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to pay me back?

S.FORM: nu 'emanan lra ku paveriyasaw u lra.
no 'emanan lra ko paveriyasaw o lra.
S.TRANSL: I will return it to you tomorrow.

S.FORM: pavaveriyas u lra nu aydan kaningku na valray?
pavaveriyas o lra no aydan kaningko na valray?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to return my book?

S.FORM: adi ku paveriyas kannu adaman diyamaw?
adi ko paveriyas kanno adaman diyamaw?
S.TRANSL: 我昨天不是已經還你了嗎?
Didn't I return it to you yesterday?

S.FORM: mau i Hosiw na paveras kaninu ini na inpic?
mao i Hosiw na paveras kanino ini na inpic?
S.TRANSL: Did Hosiw lend you this pen?

S.FORM: ai, nangku kiniveras kanintaw harem kanini na wari.
ai, nangko kiniveras kanintaw harem kanini na wari.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I borrowed it from him today.

S.FORM: mau nanu kiniveras kani Hosiw ini na inpic?
mao nano kiniveras kani Hosiw ini na inpic?
S.TRANSL: Did you borrow this pen from Hosiw?

S.FORM: melri, mau tu cinima'an kaningku ni nani.
melri, mao to cinima'an kaningko ni nani.
S.TRANSL: 不是，這是我媽媽買給我的。
No, my mom bought this for me.

S.FORM: uniyan lra ta 'ateri, uwa diya kiveras kani Rumi.
oniyan lra ta 'ateri, owa diya kiveras kani Romi.
S.TRANSL: 我們沒有鹽了，先去跟Rumi借點鹽。
We are out of salt, let's borrow some from Rumi first.

S.FORM: ai, kayku diya kiverasa.
ai, kayko diya kiverasa.
uwa paveriyasu da paysu kaningku kuwayu i Rumi.
owa paveriyaso da payso kaningko kowayo i Romi.
S.TRANSL: Go tell Rumi to give me my money back.

S.FORM: pidaya paysu tu kiyam kannu?
pidaya payso to kiyam kanno?
S.TRANSL: How much does she owe you?

S.FORM: yawa u i iyan?
yawa o i iyan?
yawa ku i sayheng semarema da kulang.
yawa ko i sayheng semarema da kolang.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to plant vegetables in the garden.

S.FORM: makuda u?
makoda o?
caluwalun dadu, remarevay ku, nu maremay lra puwadanum ku lra.
calowalon dado, remarevay ko, no maremay lra powadanom ko lra.
S.TRANSL: 草太多了，我在砍草，等一下要澆水。
There's too much grass, I'm cutting it, I'll have to water it later.

S.FORM: pulralrangay ku diya melak kananku lingaw di pitaw ay?
polralrangay ko diya melak kananko lingaw di pitaw ay?
S.TRANSL: 幫我把鐮刀和鋤頭拿來好嗎?
Will you get my scythes and hoes, please?

S.FORM: nu ca'anay i iyan?
no ca'anay i iyan?
rineca' kana kangkang i ngidiran.
rineca' kana kangkang i ngidiran.
S.TRANSL: Put it next to the plow rake.

S.FORM: piya u lra kemangkang?
piya o lra kemangkang?
S.TRANSL: Did you turn over the soil?

S.FORM: papiya ku kemangkang, 'apapiyar ku lra nu maremay.
papiya ko kemangkang, 'apapiyar ko lra no maremay.
S.TRANSL: 我剛翻過土，等等要播種。
I just turned over the soil, and so on to sow seeds.

S.FORM: karuwa ta lra kikulang kananu sinareman na kulang?
karowa ta lra kikolang kanano sinareman na kolang?
S.TRANSL: 你種的菜可以收成了嗎?
Are your vegetables ready to be harvested?

S.FORM: karuwa lra kikulang nani na kulang a, nadu na uma'i mu, adi diya karuwa malruc.
karowa lra kikolang nani na kolang a, nado na oma'i mo, adi diya karowa malroc.
S.TRANSL: 這些蔬菜可以收成了，那些樹豆還不能摘。
The vegetables are ready to harvest, but the beans are not ready to be picked yet.

S.FORM: wa! kemani kana sadu nannu kinerucan na vurasi.
wa! kemani kana sado nanno kinerocan na vorasi.
S.TRANSL: (驚嘆語氣)哇!你挖了這麼多的地瓜。
(sighs) Wow! You dug up so many gourds.

S.FORM: pulralrangay ku diya puwa i soko ay?
polralrangay ko diya powa i soko ay?
S.TRANSL: Will you help me with the barn?

S.FORM: makakuda mu?
makakoda mo?
temavavukulr mi da vulraw.
temavavokolr mi da volraw.
S.TRANSL: We're releasing fishing nets to catch fish.

S.FORM: sadu na vulraw kani diyamaw?
sado na volraw kani diyamaw?
sadu lra na 'invang na vulraw i kara'is.
sado lra na 'invang na volraw i kara'is.
S.TRANSL: 魚簍裡已經抓了很多魚。
The fish basket has been full of fish.

S.FORM: nu ma'emvang u kana vulraw mu, nu kudayaw 'emvang?
no ma'emvang o kana volraw mo, no kodayaw 'emvang?
S.TRANSL: How do you usually catch fish?

S.FORM: ku pana'aw kana tapapesuk kana vulraw.
ko pana'aw kana tapapesok kana volraw.
S.TRANSL: I shoot fish with a spear.

S.FORM: penapana' u nu pa'a'alrup u?
penapana' o no pa'a'alrop o?
S.TRANSL: Do you use a bow and arrow when hunting?

S.FORM: pinapeciran ku rawa, nu eman mu, mikuwang ku di milralrang ku kana suwan.
pinapeciran ko rawa, no eman mo, mikowang ko di milralrang ko kana sowan.
S.TRANSL: 我的獵物通常都是用陷阱抓的，偶爾也會拿槍帶狗狩獵。
My prey is usually caught in traps and occasionally I hunt with a gun and a dog.

S.FORM: ini na dalan mu, mau tu inlrangan na vavuy.
ini na dalan mo, mao to inlrangan na vavoy.
S.TRANSL: 這條路是山豬所走過的。
This is the road the boar took.

S.FORM: man madalram u diyamaw?
man madalram o diyamaw?
ini mu, mau nantu dinapalran na vavuy, semalra mau tu inlrangan na vavuy ini na dalan.
ini mo, mao nanto dinapalran na vavoy, semalra mao to inlrangan na vavoy ini na dalan.
S.TRANSL: 這是山豬的腳印，所以這是山豬所走的路。
These are the footprints of the boar, so this is the path the boar took.

S.FORM: ta pakunamunay mukuwa mena'uwa kananta pecir, mupecir lra na rawa kemaku.
ta pakonamonay mokowa mena'owa kananta pecir, mopecir lra na rawa kemako.
S.TRANSL: 快去看我們的陷阱，我想抓到獵物了吧！
Go and look at our traps, I think we've caught our prey!

S.FORM: man madalram u?
man madalram o?
kemawan cemaulr lra na suwan, ta pakunamunay mitulus.
kemawan cemaolr lra na sowan, ta pakonamonay mitolos.
S.TRANSL: 狗好像聞到味道了。我們快跟過去。
The dog seems to have smelled it. Let's follow them.

S.FORM: aeman nanu dinadaway?
aeman nano dinadaway?
S.TRANSL: 你正在製作的是什麼東西?

S.FORM: ini mu, pecir a pinangese', papecir kana tutus.
ini mo, pecir a pinangese', papecir kana totos.
S.TRANSL: 這是石壓式陷阱，用來抓老鼠的。
This is a stone trap, used to catch rats.

S.FORM: aeman nanu pinuwayan i kadu?
aeman nano pinowayan i kado?
S.TRANSL: 你放在那裡的是什麼東西?
What is that thing you put there?

S.FORM: idu mu pecir a sekung, nanta papecir kana 'ura.
ido mo pecir a sekong, nanta papecir kana 'ora.
S.TRANSL: 那是套腳式繩索陷阱，我們用它來抓山羌。
It was a leg-rigged rope trap, and we used it to catch Shankiang.

S.FORM: sadu nanta kinarasa harem kana wari, di lrayuwan datu i puvati kanta na mi'a'alrup.
sado nanta kinarasa harem kana wari, di lrayowan dato i povati kanta na mi'a'alrop.
S.TRANSL: 今天我們有很多獵物, 我們要感恩“領域之神”的賜福。
Today we have many prey, let us give thanks for the blessing of the God of the field"."

S.FORM: ai, ta puruma'aw i dekalr di ta pu'acaranay kanna dinkalranan nu kemadu.
ai, ta poroma'aw i dekalr di ta po'acaranay kanna dinkalranan no kemado.
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我們帶回部落好好分享吧!
Yeah! Let's take it back to the tribe and share it!

S.FORM: harem, pananadam ku kanmu kanantu piningaiyan na Kasavakan, datu ngadangadan na haramhaman.
harem, pananadam ko kanmo kananto piningaiyan na Kasavakan, dato ngadangadan na haramhaman.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家動物的建和語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of animals in Kasavakan language today.

S.FORM: harem , pananadam ku kanmu kanantu piningaiyan na Kasavakan, datu ngadangadan na sinaleman diya.
harem , pananadam ko kanmo kananto piningaiyan na Kasavakan, dato ngadangadan na sinaleman diya.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家植物的建和語怎麼說。

S.FORM: amana alrupe'.
amana alrope'.
amana marengay.
amana marengay.
amana mekan.
amana mekan.
pupanayu nanu valray.
popanayo nano valray.

popanayo nano impic.

popanayo nano vavalrain.

apeco na valray.

apeco na impic.

apeco na 'aya'ayam.

nieman ini na impic?
mau nangku.
mao nangko.
nieman ini na valray?
nieman ini na valray?
nintu ni Lahay.
ninto ni Lahay.
nieman ini na aicur?
nieman ini na aicor?
adi ku madalram.
adi ko madalram.
nintu ni Lahay na kavang idu?
ninto ni Lahay na kavang ido?
melri, nintu ni Asang idu na kavang.
melri, ninto ni Asang ido na kavang.
sinsi, adi ku miinada da valray.
sinsi, adi ko miinada da valray.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, I didn’t bring my textbook.

S.FORM: ukasa mena'u kananu lralrang i capingiran.
okasa mena'o kanano lralrang i capingiran.
S.TRANSL: Share the book with your classmate next to you.

S.FORM: mureput ku impic.
morepot ko impic.
valrayu kana yuéncepi
valrayo kana yoéncepi
mulremes nangku aicur.
molremes nangko aicor.
ku pavelasay u kanangku aicur.
ko pavelasay o kanangko aicor.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser.

S.FORM: katalaulep ta lra, kilrivak nu yavuruk u i dadalan.
katalaolep ta lra, kilrivak no yavorok o i dadalan.
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，回家路上要小心!
It is the end of the class, be careful on your way home.

S.FORM: sinsi, lrayuwan!
sinsi, lrayowan!
katalaulep ta lra, marepana'uwa ta diya.
katalaolep ta lra, marepana'owa ta diya.
S.TRANSL: The class is over, goodbye everyone.

S.FORM: sinsi, marepana'uwa ta diya.
sinsi, marepana'owa ta diya.
'inavayan! i Apang ku ngadan.
'inavayan! i Apang ko ngadan.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Apang.

S.FORM: Apang, 'inavayan!
Apang, 'inavayan!
'inavayan i Tulas ku ngadan.
'inavayan i Tolas ko ngadan.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Tulas.

S.FORM: Tulas, 'inavayan!
Tolas, 'inavayan!
'inavayan, i Awi ku ngadan.
'inavayan, i Awi ko ngadan.
Awi, 'inavayan! i Aniw ku.
Awi, 'inavayan! i Aniw ko.
'inavayan i Cuwak ku.
'inavayan i Cowak ko.
Cuwak, 'inavayan. i Kimsuy ku.
Cowak, 'inavayan. i Kimsoy ko.
i eman u?
i eman o?
i taina ku ni Amsing, i Tunun ku.
i taina ko ni Amsing, i Tonon ko.
i eman u?
i eman o?
i wadi ku ni Ising, i Aping ku ngadan.
i wadi ko ni Ising, i Aping ko ngadan.
S.TRANSL: 我是Ising的妹妹，我的名字是Aping。
I am Ising’s sister. My name is Aping.

S.FORM: i eman intaw?
i eman intaw?
mau nangku sinsi intaw, i Haku nantu ngadan
mao nangko sinsi intaw, i Hako nanto ngadan
i eman idu na cau?
i eman ido na cao?
mau i valri intaw, i Maysang nantu ngadan.
mao i valri intaw, i Maysang nanto ngadan.
mau i Ameng intaw?
mao i Ameng intaw?
ai, mau i Ameng intaw.
ai, mao i Ameng intaw.
i Ameng u?
i Ameng o?
melri, i Taniw ku.
melri, i Taniw ko.
i eman i Ameng?
i eman i Ameng?
i Ameng ku.
i Ameng ko.
i eman i Taniw?
i eman i Taniw?
nangku 'aliyan mau i Taniw.
nangko 'aliyan mao i Taniw.
i eman tu ngadan ni vau na vavayan?
i eman to ngadan ni vao na vavayan?
S.TRANSL: What is your elder sister’s name?

S.FORM: i Saya nantu ngadan ni valri.
i Saya nanto ngadan ni valri.
S.TRANSL: My elder sister’s name is Saya.

S.FORM: i eman tu ngadan ni wadiyu na vavayan?
i eman to ngadan ni wadiyo na vavayan?
S.TRANSL: What is your younger sister’s name?

S.FORM: i Muymuy nantu ngadan ni wadilri.
i Moymoy nanto ngadan ni wadilri.
S.TRANSL: My younger sister’s name is Muymuy.

S.FORM: madalram u kanantu ngadan?
madalram o kananto ngadan?
i Kadaw nantu ngadan.
i Kadaw nanto ngadan.
pidaya tu 'ami ni vau na ma'inay harem?
pidaya to 'ami ni vao na ma'inay harem?
S.TRANSL: How old is your elder brother?

S.FORM: mukecep misama' da lruwaca lra, nantu 'ami harem.
mokecep misama' da lrowaca lra, nanto 'ami harem.
pidaya lra nantu 'ami ni wadiyu na ma'inay?
pidaya lra nanto 'ami ni wadiyo na ma'inay?
S.TRANSL: How old is your younger brother?

S.FORM: lruwaca lra nantu 'ami harem.
lrowaca lra nanto 'ami harem.
ulra kungkuwan kanmu i dekalr?
olra kongkowan kanmo i dekalr?
S.TRANSL: Do you have schools in your community?

S.FORM: ulra.
olra.
temakakesi u kani i dekalr na kungkuwan?
temakakesi o kani i dekalr na kongkowan?
S.TRANSL: 你在這部落的學校讀書嗎?
Do you study in your tribe’s school?

S.FORM: ai temakakesi mi i kungkuwan mu, kemawan mi da saruma'enan.
ai temakakesi mi i kongkowan mo, kemawan mi da saroma'enan.
S.TRANSL: 是的，在學校讀書我們像一家人。
Yes, we are like family while we are studying at school.

S.FORM: i eman idu na ma'inay?
i eman ido na ma'inay?
mau na maralrak kani malri intaw.
mao na maralrak kani malri intaw.
i eman idu na vavayan?
i eman ido na vavayan?
mau i valri na vavayan intaw.
mao i valri na vavayan intaw.
i eman idu na alrak?
i eman ido na alrak?
mau i wadilri na ma'inay intaw.
mao i wadilri na ma'inay intaw.
kiyakarun da eman i taina?
kiyakaron da eman i taina?
S.TRANSL: 你的媽媽從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: hitay intaw.
hitay intaw.
kiyakarun da eman i temama?
kiyakaron da eman i temama?
S.TRANSL: 你的爸爸從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: sinsi intaw.
sinsi intaw.
mau i wadiyu intaw?
mao i wadiyo intaw?
melri, nantu 'aliyan ni wadilri na ma'inay intaw.
melri, nanto 'aliyan ni wadilri na ma'inay intaw.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我弟弟的朋友。
No, he is my younger brother’s friend.

S.FORM: mau i vau na vavayan intaw?
mao i vao na vavayan intaw?
melri. mau i wadilri na vavayan intaw.
melri. mao i wadilri na vavayan intaw.
S.TRANSL: No, she is my younger sister.

S.FORM: papida cauwan kantaw saruma'ena?
papida caowan kantaw saroma'ena?
S.TRANSL: How many people in their family?

S.FORM: ulra lralruwac kantaw saruma'enan.
olra lralrowac kantaw saroma'enan.
S.TRANSL: There are five people in their family.

S.FORM: ulra papida alrak kanmu i ruma'?
olra papida alrak kanmo i roma'?
S.TRANSL: How many children in your family?

S.FORM: aapat mi na lralrak i ruma' papiya.
aapat mi na lralrak i roma' papiya.
S.TRANSL: There are four children in our family.

S.FORM: ulra papida na wadiyu?
olra papida na wadiyo?
S.TRANSL: How many younger siblings do you have?

oniyan ko da wadi a ma'inay, olra tatelo na vavayan ko wadi.

S.TRANSL: I go to Green Island by boat.

S.FORM: muicas u da eman muruma'?
moicas o da eman moroma'?
muicas ku da ciēyun muruma'.
moicas ko da ciēyon moroma'.
muicas da eman i Mumuy mukuwa i kungkuwan?
moicas da eman i Momoy mokowa i kongkowan?
S.TRANSL: How does Mumuy go to school?

S.FORM: muicas da kissiya i Mumuy mukuwa i kungkuwan.
moicas da kissiya i Momoy mokowa i kongkowan.
S.TRANSL: Mumuy goes to school by train.

S.FORM: muicas da eman i kadaw mukuwa i Kalēngko?
moicas da eman i kadaw mokowa i Kalēngko?
S.TRANSL: How does kadaw go to church?

S.FORM: midinsiya i Kadaw mukuwa i Kalēngko.
midinsiya i Kadaw mokowa i Kalēngko.
S.TRANSL: Kadaw goes to church by bicycle.

S.FORM: muicas u da ciēyun mukuwa i kungkuwan?
moicas o da ciēyon mokowa i kongkowan?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by MRT?

S.FORM: melri, muicas ku da bas mukuwa i kungkuwan.
melri, moicas ko da bas mokowa i kongkowan.
S.TRANSL: No, I go to school by bus.

S.FORM: midinsiya u mukuwa i kungkuwan?
midinsiya o mokowa i kongkowan?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by bicycle?

S.FORM: ai, midinsiya ku mukuwa i kungkuwan.
ai, midinsiya ko mokowa i kongkowan.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to school by bicycle.

S.FORM: muicas u da kawtiyē mukuwa i takaw?
moicas o da kawtiyē mokowa i takaw?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail?

S.FORM: ai, muicas ku da kawtiyē mukuwa i Takaw.
ai, moicas ko da kawtiyē mokowa i Takaw.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail.

S.FORM: nu mukuwa u i valangaw mu, muicas u da kissiya? melri mu, mau na hikoki?
no mokowa o i valangaw mo, moicas o da kissiya? melri mo, mao na hikoki?
S.TRANSL: 你去台東搭火車還是搭飛機?
Are you going to Taitung by train or by plane?

S.FORM: muicas ku da hikoki, maradika na hikoki kana kissiya.
moicas ko da hikoki, maradika na hikoki kana kissiya.
S.TRANSL: 我搭飛機，搭飛機比搭火車快。
I will take the plane because it is faster than the train.

S.FORM: nu mukuwa u i Valangaw mu, muicas u da bas? midusiya u?
no mokowa o i Valangaw mo, moicas o da bas? midosiya o?
S.TRANSL: 你去台東搭公車嗎?開車嗎?
Are you going to drive to Taitung or take the bus?

S.FORM: midusiya ku mukuwa i Valangaw, marakalra'ayan kana bas nu midusiya ku.
midosiya ko mokowa i Valangaw, marakalra'ayan kana bas no midosiya ko.
S.TRANSL: 我是開車去台東，我開車比搭公車方便。
I will drive to Taitung because it is more convenient than the bus.

S.FORM: adalrep kanmu ruma' na Supermarket?
adalrep kanmo roma' na Sopermarket?
S.TRANSL: Is the market close to your house?

S.FORM: adi adalrep, miotobay ku mukuwa i Supermarket.
adi adalrep, miotobay ko mokowa i Sopermarket.
S.TRANSL: 不近，我都騎摩托車去超市。
No, it is not, so I always ride the motorcycle to the market.

S.FORM: adalrep i kungkuwan na yubingkiyok?
adalrep i kongkowan na yobingkiyok?
S.TRANSL: Is the post office close to the school?

S.FORM: adalrep, kemakawang ta meredek ta lra.
adalrep, kemakawang ta meredek ta lra.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it is within walking distance.

S.FORM: adalrep i ēki na akaakanan?
adalrep i ēki na akaakanan?
S.TRANSL: Is the restaurant close to the station?

S.FORM: nu mupacalan ta i ēki mu, makawang ta diya lruwaca vungkang mu, meredek ta lra.
no mopacalan ta i ēki mo, makawang ta diya lrowaca vongkang mo, meredek ta lra.
S.TRANSL: 出車站再走五分鐘就到了。
It only takes five minutes after you walk out of the station.

S.FORM: miwari u harem kana wari?
miwari o harem kana wari?
kemuda diyamaw?
kemoda diyamaw?
maranger ku mukuwa mudadangiya kannu.
maranger ko mokowa modadangiya kanno.
S.TRANSL: I would like to visit you.

S.FORM: ulra ku vangavangan harem kana wari, nu 'emanan lra miwari ku lra!
olra ko vangavangan harem kana wari, no 'emanan lra miwari ko lra!
S.TRANSL: 我今天有事要忙，明天我才有空了！
I am out today. I won’t be free until tomorrow.

S.FORM: nu kemadu mu, kayku lra mena'uwa kannu nu 'emanan piya ta lra kare'alri maw!
no kemado mo, kayko lra mena'owa kanno no 'emanan piya ta lra kare'alri maw!
S.TRANSL: 那麼,我明天下午再去探望你了喔！
Then, are you available tomorrow? I’ll visit you tomorrow afternoon.

S.FORM: ai, ku ngarayaw u lra i ruma'.
ai, ko ngarayaw o lra i roma'.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I will wait for you at home.

S.FORM: kiyumalra ku diya, karuwa ku pasirep kananu ngai? kuy valrayaw kema ku.
kiyomalra ko diya, karowa ko pasirep kanano ngai? koy valrayaw kema ko.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄音嗎?我想做紀錄。
Would you mind if I do the voice recording? I would like to keep a record.

S.FORM: ai! kuwaceng da eman!
ai! kowaceng da eman!
karuwa ku pasirep kani di kananu dadek?
karowa ko pasirep kani di kanano dadek?
S.TRANSL: 我可以錄這裡及你的身影嗎?
Would you mind if I do the video recording of here and you?

S.FORM: yi ! adi ku piyamau di, adi inapecan ini na soko, manan.
yi ! adi ko piyamao di, adi inapecan ini na soko, manan.
S.TRANSL: 哦!我又不好看，倉庫也沒整理，不要啦。
No, I am plain and the warehouse hasn’t been tidied up yet.

S.FORM: nu kemadu mu, ku siyasingaw maruwa lra.
no kemado mo, ko siyasingaw marowa lra.
S.TRANSL: Then I will just take photos.

S.FORM: kuwaceng! amana siyasingaw a!
kowaceng! amana siyasingaw a!
ai! lrayuwan kanu muwai u diya kipakiumalr kaningku.
ai! lrayowan kano mowai o diya kipakiomalr kaningko.
S.TRANSL: 好吧！謝謝你願意讓我訪問。
Alright! Thank you for accepting the interview.

S.FORM: ikaira! kiyaumalr u da eman diyamaw?
ikaira! kiyaomalr o da eman diyamaw?
S.TRANSL: You are welcome. What would you like to know?

S.FORM: kiyaumalr ku diya kannu da lralrak u diya mu, aeman nanu kiyakarunan?
kiyaomalr ko diya kanno da lralrak o diya mo, aeman nano kiyakaronan?
S.TRANSL: 請問您年輕時是做什麼的?
What do you do when you are young?

S.FORM: kanggohu ku adiyu diya, harem lra mu, toysiw ku lra.
kanggoho ko adiyo diya, harem lra mo, toysiw ko lra.
S.TRANSL: 我以前是護士，但我現在退休了。
I was a nurse but I am retired now.

S.FORM: ulra nu kiyakarunan harem?
olra no kiyakaronan harem?
S.TRANSL: Then, are you working at the moment?

S.FORM: kiyakarun ku i kungkuwan.
kiyakaron ko i kongkowan.
nanu alrak mu, ulra kikadu i dekalr?
nano alrak mo, olra kikado i dekalr?
S.TRANSL: 您的孩子有住在部落嗎?
Do your kids live in the tribe too?

S.FORM: adi, kaadu i Tokay ku alrak.
adi, kaado i Tokay ko alrak.
S.TRANSL: 不，我的孩子在都市居住。
No, my kids are all living in the city.

S.FORM: sasa u na kaadu i ruma' harem?
sasa o na kaado i roma' harem?
S.TRANSL: Then, do you live by yourself?

S.FORM: ulra diya ku suwan a sasaya, di sasaya a 'ayam, mau lra nangku rinuma'enan nadu mu!
olra diya ko sowan a sasaya, di sasaya a 'ayam, mao lra nangko rinoma'enan nado mo!
S.TRANSL: 我還有養一隻狗和一隻鳥，牠們也是我的家人啊！
I also keep a dog and a bird. They are my family.

S.FORM: ulra ku vinaaw a ngiyaw saya, mi'avalr ku da haramhaman mu, adi kasalrengseng.
olra ko vinaaw a ngiyaw saya, mi'avalr ko da haramhaman mo, adi kasalrengseng.
S.TRANSL: 我也有養一隻貓，有動物陪伴不會無聊。
I have a cat too. I won’t get bored with the company of my pet.

S.FORM: maranger ku kiumalr da kapalisilisi na pararawayan.
maranger ko kiomalr da kapalisilisi na pararawayan.
S.TRANSL: 我想請問你關於打獵的禁忌。
I would like to ask you about the taboos of hunting.

S.FORM: adi ku kamadalraman, aymu, karuwa ku tumuvang daku kinadalraman.
adi ko kamadalraman, aymo, karowa ko tomovang dako kinadalraman.
S.TRANSL: 我不太懂，但我能回答我所了解的。
I don’t know much about that, but I will tell you everything I know.

S.FORM: miinada mu da eman na pa'a'alrupan? ulra eman na kapalisilisi?
miinada mo da eman na pa'a'alropan? olra eman na kapalisilisi?
S.TRANSL: 你們打獵的武器有什麼禁忌嗎?
Do you have any taboos about hunting weapons?

S.FORM: naniyam pa'a'alrupan mu, melri nu sasihiwan na vavayan
naniyam pa'a'alropan mo, melri no sasihiwan na vavayan
S.TRANSL: 我們打獵的武器不是可以讓女生碰到的。
Our hunting weapons are untouchable to women.

S.FORM: na vavayan mu, karuwa marelrang mukuwa pa'alrupa?
na vavayan mo, karowa marelrang mokowa pa'alropa?
S.TRANSL: 那女人可以一起去打獵嗎?
Then, can women go hunting together?

S.FORM: iya! salaw palisi kemadu, adi karuwa pa'alrup na vavayan.
iya! salaw palisi kemado, adi karowa pa'alrop na vavayan.
S.TRANSL: 不，那是非常犯忌的，女人不可以打獵。
No, that’s a violation. Women cannot go hunting.

S.FORM: Kadaw, uniyan lra na kuca i ruma', uwa cima' da kuca.
Kadaw, oniyan lra na koca i roma', owa cima' da koca.
S.TRANSL: Kadaw，家裡沒有酒了，你去買酒。
Kadaw, our home is out of rice wine, please go and buy some.

S.FORM: ulra diya i sawka sadalilran, amana diya cemima'!
olra diya i sawka sadalilran, amana diya cemima'!
S.TRANSL: 廚房裡還有一瓶，不用買吧!
There is still one bottle left in the kitchen, so there is no need to buy one!

S.FORM: saya dalilran adi pauwa, uwa diya cima' duwa dalilran.
saya dalilran adi paowa, owa diya cima' dowa dalilran.
S.TRANSL: 一瓶不夠，再去買兩瓶回來。
One bottle is not enough for me, go and buy two more back.

S.FORM: cacima' ku da kuca, menaniwan mu da kuca?
cacima' ko da koca, menaniwan mo da koca?
S.TRANSL: 我要買米酒，你們有賣嗎?
I am looking for rice wine. Do you have any rice wine?

S.FORM: ulra! cacima' u pidaya?
olra! cacima' o pidaya?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How many bottles do you need?

S.FORM: cacima' ku da duwaya dalilran, di cacima' ku diya da sayacavu na veras.
cacima' ko da dowaya dalilran, di cacima' ko diya da sayacavo na veras.
S.TRANSL: 我要買兩瓶，還要買一包米。
I want two bottles and a pack of rice.

S.FORM: ulra kani na veras, ulra diya nanu cacima'an?
olra kani na veras, olra diya nano cacima'an?
S.TRANSL: 米在這裡，你還有要買的嗎?
Here is the rice, what else do you need?

S.FORM: cacima' ku diya da vucinun, ulra mu?
cacima' ko diya da vocinon, olra mo?
S.TRANSL: I want some eggs too, do you have some?

S.FORM: mupiya lra iniwan naniyam vucinun.
mopiya lra iniwan naniyam vocinon.
cacima' ku da kavang.
cacima' ko da kavang.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: maranger u cemima' kana kemuda diyamaw?
maranger o cemima' kana kemoda diyamaw?
S.TRANSL: 你想要買什麼樣子的嗎?
What kind of clothes do you like?

S.FORM: cacima' ku kana lrikeci tu 'aselr na kavang.
cacima' ko kana lrikeci to 'aselr na kavang.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy the clothes with short sleeves.

S.FORM: kemuda ini na dangdalang?
kemoda ini na dangdalang?
ulra diya na duma na dulram?
olra diya na doma na dolram?
ulra diya na vulreci' di na cangiya.
olra diya na volreci' di na cangiya.
S.TRANSL: We have white and blue ones too.

S.FORM: 'aylra saya na cangiya na kavang.
'aylra saya na cangiya na kavang.
S.TRANSL: 請給我一件藍色的衣服。
Please give me the clothes in blue.

S.FORM: mukuwa u i iyan haremay? mukuwa u undowa?
mokowa o i iyan haremay? mokowa o ondowa?
S.TRANSL: kacaw你剛剛去哪裡了?你去運動嗎?
kacaw, where have you been just now? Did you go exercising?

S.FORM: melri, mukuwa ku pulralranga kani mulri meniwan da kulang.
melri, mokowa ko polralranga kani molri meniwan da kolang.
S.TRANSL: No, I went grocery shopping for my grandma.

S.FORM: ya! kemadu! miwari u nu karauv? mukasaya ta mekan kema ku.
ya! kemado! miwari o no karaov? mokasaya ta mekan kema ko.
S.TRANSL: 喔!這樣啊，你晚上有沒有空?要不要和我一起吃飯。
No wonder! Are you available at night? Would you like to have a meal with me?

S.FORM: adi, yawa ku cemima'a da kavang.
adi, yawa ko cemima'a da kavang.
S.TRANSL: No, I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: nu kemadu mu, marelranga ku kannu.
no kemado mo, marelranga ko kanno.
S.TRANSL: Then, I will go with you.

S.FORM: 'inavayan! pidaya paisu ini na kulang?
'inavayan! pidaya paiso ini na kolang?
S.TRANSL: Hello, how much is this bunch of vegetables?

S.FORM: na kulang mu, saya vutu' makavuca'an paisu.
na kolang mo, saya voto' makavoca'an paiso.
S.TRANSL: The vegetables are $20 for a bunch.

S.FORM: pidaya paisu ini na vurasi?
pidaya paiso ini na vorasi?
S.TRANSL: How much are these sweet potatoes?

S.FORM: na vurasi mu, saya tingting makatelun paisu.
na vorasi mo, saya tingting makatelon paiso.
'aylra duwaya vutu' kulang di saya tingting na vurasi.
'aylra dowaya voto' kolang di saya tingting na vorasi.
S.TRANSL: 請給我兩把菜和一斤地瓜。
Please give me two bunches of vegetables and a pound of sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: Vituen, malalup ku miinada da impic, karuwa u pavelas kaningku?
Vitoen, malalop ko miinada da impic, karowa o pavelas kaningko?
S.TRANSL: Vituen，我忘了帶筆，你可以借我嗎?
Vituen, I forgot to bring my pen. Can you lend me one?

S.FORM: maresan ku kannu adi ku miinada, mau nantu ni Vali ini a!
maresan ko kanno adi ko miinada, mao nanto ni Vali ini a!
S.TRANSL: 我跟你一樣沒帶，這支是Vali的!

S.FORM: karuwa u pavelas kaningku dika? dika ku pareveriyas kannu.
karowa o pavelas kaningko dika? dika ko pareveriyas kanno.
S.TRANSL: 可以借我一下子嗎?我很快就還你。
Can you lend me the pen for a second? I will return to you immediately.

S.FORM: ai, niya!
ai, niya!
lrayuwan! di lrayuwan Kuwayu lra i Vali maw!
lrayowan! di lrayowan Kowayo lra i Vali maw!
S.TRANSL: Thank you and thank Vali for me.

S.FORM: ulra eman nanu kakudain diyamaw?
olra eman nano kakodain diyamaw?
pavaveriyas ku kanani na duwaya valray.
pavaveriyas ko kanani na dowaya valray.
S.TRANSL: I want to return these two books.

S.FORM: ai, ulra diya kakudain?
ai, olra diya kakodain?
S.TRANSL: No problem and what else do you need?

S.FORM: kiyavelas ku diya kanani na teluwa valray.
kiyavelas ko diya kanani na telowa valray.
S.TRANSL: I would like to borrow these three books.

S.FORM: ai, ikalaalup nu pukaapat wariyan mu, kadika preveliyas maw!
ai, ikalaalop no pokaapat wariyan mo, kadika preveliyas maw!
S.TRANSL: 好的，記得第四天要拿來還喔！
Sure and remember to return them on the fourth day.

S.FORM: adi u diya pareveliyas kaningku da aicur.
adi o diya pareveliyas kaningko da aicor.
S.TRANSL: You haven’t returned me the eraser.

S.FORM: piya ku lra pareveliyas a adaman.
piya ko lra pareveliyas a adaman.
man mulremes lra ku aicer?
man molremes lra ko aicer?
S.TRANSL: 為何我的橡皮擦怎麼不見了。
Then, why is my eraser missing?

S.FORM: lramu nu pavelasanay lra kani Udalr.
lramo no pavelasanay lra kani Udalr.
S.TRANSL: Maybe you lend it to Udalr.

S.FORM: taa, kayku diya kiumalra kantaw nu kemadu.
taa, kayko diya kiomalra kantaw no kemado.
S.TRANSL: 我不知道，如果是那樣，讓我先去問他看看。
I don’t know. If so, let me go and ask her first.

S.FORM: kunu pavelasay diya kanangku aicur.
kono pavelasay diya kanangko aicor.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser first.

S.FORM: Vali, ini na kavang na pakaicas mu, nintu ipavelas kannu ni Vituen?
Vali, ini na kavang na pakaicas mo, ninto ipavelas kanno ni Vitoen?
S.TRANSL: Vali, did Vituen lend you this coat?

S.FORM: melri, ini mu, nintu iveray kaningku ni nani.
melri, ini mo, ninto iveray kaningko ni nani.
S.TRANSL: 不是，這是我媽媽買給我的。
No, my mom bought it for me.

S.FORM: maresan kananu kavang na pakaicas ni Vituen.
maresan kanano kavang na pakaicas ni Vitoen.
S.TRANSL: Vituen’s coat is the same as yours.

S.FORM: 'ude'udem nantu kavang na pakaicas, adi maresan naniyan dulraman/pinivalrayan.
'ode'odem nanto kavang na pakaicas, adi maresan naniyan dolraman/pinivalrayan.
S.TRANSL: 他的外套是黑色的，我們的顏色不一樣。
His coat is black, so our colors are different.

S.FORM: Vali, kivelas u da paisu kani Vituen?
Vali, kivelas o da paiso kani Vitoen?
S.TRANSL: Vali, did you borrow money from Vituen?

S.FORM: ulra, pavaveliyas ku kantaw kanini na wari kema ku mu, malalup ku miinada da paisu.
olra, pavaveliyas ko kantaw kanini na wari kema ko mo, malalop ko miinada da paiso.
S.TRANSL: 有，我本來今天要還他，我忘記帶錢了。
Yes, I was supposed to return to him today, but I forgot to bring the money.

S.FORM: nu kemadu mu, pavaveliyas u nu aidan lra?
no kemado mo, pavaveliyas o no aidan lra?
S.TRANSL: Then, when will you return the money?

S.FORM: nu 'emanan kuy pareveliyasaw lra kantaw.
no 'emanan koy pareveliyasaw lra kantaw.
S.TRANSL: I will return to him tomorrow.

S.FORM: ai, kulra rengayaw kani Vituen.
ai, kolra rengayaw kani Vitoen.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I will tell Vituen for you.

S.FORM: nu papecir kana tutus mu, pinangse'an da varasa', na tikulas mu, tineru'an kanantu ni'en na pencir. penauwa nu kinuwadu.
no papecir kana totos mo, pinangse'an da varasa', na tikolas mo, tinero'an kananto ni'en na pencir. penaowa no kinowado.
S.TRANSL: 要獵捕老鼠是⽤⽯壓式的陷阱，⽵雞是要⽤套頸式的陷阱，那樣做才對。
It is correct to catch mice through rangay and catch bamboo partridges through qjiulang.

S.FORM: mau na kemadu awlra di, ingku na pacepelr ! semalra adi ku karaasa.
mao na kemado awlra di, ingko na pacepelr ! semalra adi ko karaasa.
S.TRANSL: 原來是那樣，是我搞錯了！難怪我都獵捕不到。
No wonder! I am mistaken and that’s why I cannot catch any of them.

S.FORM: alra kunu panadamay diya kana marekaduwa na papeciran.
alra kono panadamay diya kana marekadowa na papeciran.
S.TRANSL: 那我再教你怎麼製作這兩種陷阱。
Then I will teach you how to set up these two traps.

S.FORM: ai kasa lra 'inava! nu kemani mu, kasayhu ku lra penecir nu kadaidan lra.
ai kasa lra 'inava! no kemani mo, kasayho ko lra penecir no kadaidan lra.
S.TRANSL: 好啊！太棒了！這樣我以後就會抓到獵物了。
Great! I will be able to catch the prey in the future.

S.FORM: caluwalun lra i 'uma, uwa i suru alaku diya nangku lingaw, kayta i 'uma.
calowalon lra i 'oma, owa i soro alako diya nangko lingaw, kayta i 'oma.
S.TRANSL: 田裡的草太長了，你先去倉庫拿我的鐮刀，我們去田裡。
The grass in the fields is too tall. Go to the warehouse to take the sickle and let’s go to the fields.

S.FORM: pinuwayan i iyan na lingaw?
pinowayan i iyan na lingaw?
ulra i ngidiran kana 'ara, musavak u i suru mu, nana'u u lra.
olra i ngidiran kana 'ara, mosavak o i soro mo, nana'o o lra.
S.TRANSL: 在圓簍的旁邊，你進去倉庫就會看到了。
It is next to the round basket. You will see it when you enter the warehouse.

S.FORM: kilrivak, amana mupanana, idangan na lingaw.
kilrivak, amana mopanana, idangan na lingaw.
S.TRANSL: 小心拿，不要受傷，鐮刀很利。
Be careful and don’t get hurt. The sickle is very sharp.

S.FORM: di idada'elri nangku pecir!
di idada'elri nangko pecir!
S.TRANSL: 而且不要踩到我的陷阱!

S.FORM: ulra i iyan nanu pecir?
olra i iyan nano pecir?
kadu i makalusu kana kawi nangku pecir.
kado i makaloso kana kawi nangko pecir.
S.TRANSL: 我的陷阱在那棵樹的下面。
My trap is under that tree.

S.FORM: adi u kalaalup da pinuwayan?
adi o kalaalop da pinowayan?
S.TRANSL: 你不會忘記放的地方嗎?
Don’t you forget where it was placed?

S.FORM: ulra ku pinudungan kadu, semalra madalram ku ulra kani ku pecir.
olra ko pinodongan kado, semalra madalram ko olra kani ko pecir.
S.TRANSL: 這邊有我做的記號，因此我知道我的陷阱在哪裡。
I make a mark here, so I know where my trap is.

S.FORM: sulung ini. ta ca'anay i dinanuman kivulraw.
solong ini. ta ca'anay i dinanoman kivolraw.
S.TRANSL: 這是魚筌，我們放在溪邊捕魚。
This is a fish trap which we put beside the river for fishing.

S.FORM: uniyan mi da sulung, niyam pangasipay kana pangangasipan.
oniyan mi da solong, niyam pangasipay kana pangangasipan.
S.TRANSL: 我們那邊沒有魚筌，我們都用釣竿抓魚。
We don’t have any fish traps there, so we catch fish with a fishing rod.

S.FORM: adi ku diya patalram da pangasipan, panadamay ku lra nu kadaidan lra!
adi ko diya patalram da pangasipan, panadamay ko lra no kadaidan lra!
S.TRANSL: 我沒有嘗試過釣魚法，你下次教我吧!
I have never tried a fishing rod before, would you mind teaching me next time?

S.FORM: ai! marelranga ta lra mukuwa pangasipa nu masalr lra.
ai! marelranga ta lra mokowa pangasipa no masalr lra.
S.TRANSL: 好啊!我們下次一起去釣魚。
Sure! Let’s go fishing together next time.

S.FORM: nu masalr lra mu, ku panadamay u lra demaway kana sulung.
no masalr lra mo, ko panadamay o lra demaway kana solong.
S.TRANSL: I will teach you how to make a fish trap next time.

S.FORM: mahuwahu lra nanu pangangasipan, lramu ulra mupangasip na vulraw! pakunamuni kemedeng.
mahowaho lra nano pangangasipan, lramo olra mopangasip na volraw! pakonamoni kemedeng.
S.TRANSL: 你的釣竿動了，是不是有魚上鉤了!你快拉起來。
Your fishing rod is moving. Isn’t the fish on the hook? Pull it up!

S.FORM: nu maremay lra, mahinganghing dadu na sudang, kemedenga ku kani, inu mu uwa alakay ku kana ami kadiyu.
no maremay lra, mahinganghing dado na sodang, kemedenga ko kani, ino mo owa alakay ko kana ami kadiyo.
S.TRANSL: 等等，船太晃了。我在這邊拉釣竿，你去那邊幫我拿網子來。
Wait, the ship is rolling heavily. I am here to pull the fishing rod and you should go there to grab me the net.

S.FORM: kedengu puwa kaningku kani na vulraw, kunu pulralrangay kemedeng.
kedengo powa kaningko kani na volraw, kono polralrangay kemedeng.
S.TRANSL: 把魚拉到我這邊。我幫妳拉起來。
Pull the fish to my side and I will help you pull it up.

S.FORM: 'inava dadu a! miakan ta pakirev harem, matemuy lra na 'ara.
'inava dado a! miakan ta pakirev harem, matemoy lra na 'ara.
S.TRANSL: 太好了!今天大豐收，魚簍都裝滿了。
Great! It is a bumper crop today with full fish baskets.

S.FORM: anlra! pakunamuna ta muruma' pu'acara data dinkalranan.
anlra! pakonamona ta moroma' po'acara data dinkalranan.
S.TRANSL: 走吧！我們快回去和族人分享。
Let’s go back immediately and share it with everyone.

S.FORM: ulralra na sinsi.
olralra na sinsi.
amana lra kivangavang, kadadika kayan.
amana lra kivangavang, kadadika kayan.
S.TRANSL: 不要再玩了，快坐在座位上。
Stop playing and quickly sit in your seat.

S.FORM: irayan, piwari ku lra!
irayan, piwari ko lra!
kadadika usavak.
kadadika osavak.
pida liyusan harem kana wari?
pida liyosan harem kana wari?
liyusan lima, harem kana wari!
liyosan lima, harem kana wari!
S.TRANSL: 今天星期五，明天放假，一起出去玩吧!
It’s Friday today, we have a day off tomorrow. Let’s go out and play together!

S.FORM: ai! kayta i dinanuman.
ai! kayta i dinanoman.
S.TRANSL: Great! Let’s go to the riverside.

S.FORM: pida liyusan nu 'emanan?
pida liyosan no 'emanan?
S.TRANSL: What day will it be tomorrow?

S.FORM: telu liyusan nu 'emanan, kayta kivangavanga ay!
telo liyosan no 'emanan, kayta kivangavanga ay!
S.TRANSL: 明天星期三，我們明天下午去玩球吧!
Tomorrow will be Wednesday. Let’s go play ball tomorrow afternoon!

S.FORM: ikakuda u nu 'emanan?
ikakoda o no 'emanan?
S.TRANSL: What will you be doing tomorrow morning?

S.FORM: kasede'an nu 'emanan, rarelrang ku kani nani yawa mi i kiyokay.
kasede'an no 'emanan, rarelrang ko kani nani yawa mi i kiyokay.
S.TRANSL: 明天是星期日，我要和媽媽去教會。
Tomorrow will be Sunday, I will be going to church with my mom.

S.FORM: kemuda u?
kemoda o?
maranger ku muta', yawa ku i caca'iyan.
maranger ko mota', yawa ko i caca'iyan.
S.TRANSL: I feel like vomiting. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: mapungaw ku.
mapongaw ko.
pihalrep talaulep.
pihalrep talaolep.
sinsi, nana ku tiyalr, yawa ku i caca'iyan.
sinsi, nana ko tiyalr, yawa ko i caca'iyan.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我肚子痛，要去廁所。
Teacher, I have a stomachache. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: ai, kadadika uwa.
ai, kadadika owa.
karuwa ku mukuwa muras da lima?
karowa ko mokowa moras da lima?
S.TRANSL: May I go wash my hands?

S.FORM: maremay lra! uwa lra nu temalaulep ta lra!
maremay lra! owa lra no temalaolep ta lra!
S.TRANSL: It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: sinsi, nana ku canguru', avuruk ku nu piya ta kare'alri.
sinsi, nana ko cangoro', avorok ko no piya ta kare'alri.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我頭好痛，午餐完我要回去。
It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: ai, taranapaw lra, nu uwaruma' u.
ai, taranapaw lra, no owaroma' o.
S.TRANSL: Okay, take care and go home.

S.FORM: sinsi, nu masalr diya kana liyusan sa sasede' ku, yawa ku kina'uwa kana ising.
sinsi, no masalr diya kana liyosan sa sasede' ko, yawa ko kina'owa kana ising.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我下禮拜一要請假，我要去看醫生。
Teacher, I need to take a sick leave next Monday. I have to see a doctor.

S.FORM: ai, taranapaw nu dadek.
ai, taranapaw no dadek.
ulra i iyan i Mumuy?
olra i iyan i Momoy?
nana tu tiyalr, ulra i caca'iyan.
nana to tiyalr, olra i caca'iyan.
S.TRANSL: She has a stomachache. She’s in the restroom.

S.FORM: ulra i iyan i Amsing?
olra i iyan i Amsing?
nana tu tukeraw, semede' harem kana wari.
nana to tokeraw, semede' harem kana wari.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, Amsing has a sore throat. She took a sick leave today.

S.FORM: man adi duwa i Muymuy?
man adi dowa i Moymoy?
tu pakavi'asaw.
to pakavi'asaw.
rengay diya kanu ieman di nanmu rinuma'enan i savak?
rengay diya kano ieman di nanmo rinoma'enan i savak?
i Amsing ku ngadan, mukecep ku 'ami.
i Amsing ko ngadan, mokecep ko 'ami.
S.TRANSL: My name is Amsing, and I’m 10 years old.

S.FORM: i eman nu ngadan?
i eman no ngadan?
i Amsing ku ngadan.
i Amsing ko ngadan.
alrak u da eman mauwan?
alrak o da eman maowan?
S.TRANSL: What ethnic group are you from?

S.FORM: alrak ku da Pinuyumayan.
alrak ko da Pinoyomayan.
pinuyumayan papiya kanmu i ruma'?
pinoyomayan papiya kanmo i roma'?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: ai, Pinuyumayan mi papiya i ruma'.
ai, Pinoyomayan mi papiya i roma'.
S.TRANSL: 是的，我們全家都是卑南族人。
Yes, my whole family is Pinuyumayan.

S.FORM: a yēncumin mu saruma'enan?
a yēncomin mo saroma'enan?
S.TRANSL: 你的全家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: melri, i malri mu Pinuyumayan, i nani mu, pairang.
melri, i malri mo Pinoyomayan, i nani mo, pairang.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我的爸爸是卑南族，我的媽媽是漢人。
No, my father is Pinuyumayan, and my mother is Han Taiwanese.

S.FORM: nieman u alrak?
nieman o alrak?
alrak ku ni Rahay.
alrak ko ni Rahay.
mau i temama idiyu? pidaya lra tu 'ami?
mao i temama idiyo? pidaya lra to 'ami?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: makalruwac lra tu 'ami.
makalrowac lra to 'ami.
mau i temama idiyu? pidaya lra tu 'ami?
mao i temama idiyo? pidaya lra to 'ami?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: melri, mau na dawdawan kaniyam i dekalr, makawalun lra tu 'ami.
melri, mao na dawdawan kaniyam i dekalr, makawalon lra to 'ami.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我們部落的耆老，他80歲了。
No, he is an elder of our tribe. He is 80 years old.

S.FORM: pidaya lra tu 'ami ni vau na ma'inay?
pidaya lra to 'ami ni vao na ma'inay?
pulu' walu tu 'ami ni valri.
polo' walo to 'ami ni valri.
marama'idang da sadu kannu ni vau na ma'inay?
marama'idang da sado kanno ni vao na ma'inay?
S.TRANSL: 你哥哥年紀比你大很多嗎?
Is your brother much older than you?

S.FORM: makiteng ku kantaw da lruwaca 'ami.
makiteng ko kantaw da lrowaca 'ami.
pidaya nanu katihasaran?
pidaya nano katihasaran?
saleman makapetelr ku vakesiw.
saleman makapetelr ko vakesiw.
sawaliyan ta lra adi marepana'u, tihasar u lra ay!
sawaliyan ta lra adi marepana'o, tihasar o lra ay!
S.TRANSL: I haven’t seen you in a while. Have you grown taller?

S.FORM: ai, saleman makatelun ku lra vakesiw harem.
ai, saleman makatelon ko lra vakesiw harem.
semver u lra harem ay?
semver o lra harem ay?
adi, pacepelr u mena'u.
adi, pacepelr o mena'o.
valivaliw u lra?
valivaliw o lra?
adi, semver ku lra.
adi, semver ko lra.
semver u lra?
semver o lra?
ai, makatelun ku tingting harem.
ai, makatelon ko tingting harem.
yawa u i iyan?
yawa o i iyan?
yawa ku i pankungse maya'a kana sinsi.
yawa ko i pankongse maya'a kana sinsi.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to the office to see the teacher.

S.FORM: yawa i iyan i Amsing.
yawa i iyan i Amsing.
yawa 'ematelra da limkan.
yawa 'ematelra da limkan.
S.TRANSL: He’s going to throw away the trash.

S.FORM: ulra i iyan i Amsing?
olra i iyan i Amsing?
ulra i pakulalimayan, yawa kirepakuwa kana pakulima nu maremay intaw.
olra i pakolalimayan, yawa kirepakowa kana pakolima no maremay intaw.
S.TRANSL: 他在游泳池，他等一下要比賽游泳。
He’s at the swimming pool. He’s going to compete in a swimming competition later.

S.FORM: ulra i iyan i Muymuy? yawa intaw kirepakuwa kana pavekas nu maremay.
olra i iyan i Moymoy? yawa intaw kirepakowa kana pavekas no maremay.
S.TRANSL: Muymuy在哪裡?她等一下要比賽跑步。
Where is Muymuy? She’s going to compete in a running competition later.

S.FORM: ulra i kiyokay, kayku marengaya kantaw.
olra i kiyokay, kayko marengaya kantaw.
S.TRANSL: She’s in the auditorium. I’ll go call her.

S.FORM: kayta i lalinayan.
kayta i lalinayan.
S.TRANSL: Let’s go to the playground together.

S.FORM: kayku cimima'a da kare'a'alriyan, nu maremay kayku lra maya'a kannu.
kayko cimima'a da kare'a'alriyan, no maremay kayko lra maya'a kanno.
S.TRANSL: 我先去買午餐，等一下去找你。
I’ll go buy lunch first, and then I’ll meet you later.

S.FORM: kayta makuca kana putavuwan!
kayta makoca kana potavowan!
S.TRANSL: Let’s carry the lunch boxes together!

S.FORM: uwa aya'u na cau, yawa ku maya'a kana sinsi.
owa aya'o na cao, yawa ko maya'a kana sinsi.
S.TRANSL: 你找別人，我要去找老師。
You find someone else, I’m going to find the teacher.

S.FORM: yawa i Amsing kirepakuwa kana cacepukan da mali harem kana wari?
yawa i Amsing kirepakowa kana cacepokan da mali harem kana wari?
S.TRANSL: Is Amsing competing in croquet today?

S.FORM: adi, yawa kirepakuwa kana unkunan.
adi, yawa kirepakowa kana onkonan.
S.TRANSL: No, he’s competing in high jump.

S.FORM: nu undokay kana wari mu yawa u kirepakuwa?
no ondokay kana wari mo yawa o kirepakowa?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: yawa ku mu! yawa ku kirepakuwa kana pavekas.
yawa ko mo! yawa ko kirepakowa kana pavekas.
S.TRANSL: 我要去啊！我要去比賽跑步。

S.FORM: yawa u kirepakuwa nu undokay adu kana wari?
yawa o kirepakowa no ondokay ado kana wari?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: yawa ku kirepakuwa kana cacepukan da mali.
yawa ko kirepakowa kana cacepokan da mali.
ikakuda ta nu undokay adu kana wari?
ikakoda ta no ondokay ado kana wari?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會那天要做甚麼?
What will we do in the sports day?

S.FORM: yawa ta kirepakuwa kana makedekedeng da cali.
yawa ta kirepakowa kana makedekedeng da cali.
S.TRANSL: We will compete in tug of war.

S.FORM: naniwan ta kana akanen nu undokay?
naniwan ta kana akanen no ondokay?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會時要賣食物嗎?
Will we sell food at the sports day?

S.FORM: adi, naniwan ta kana tavululr.
adi, naniwan ta kana tavololr.
wa! muelak u kana pukaisa, tatena' u kana sayhu!
wa! moelak o kana pokaisa, tatena' o kana sayho!
S.TRANSL: 哇！你獲得了第一名耶，真是厲害！
Congratulations on getting first place! You’re amazing!

S.FORM: lrayuwan!
lrayowan!
ulra i ruma' i temu na vavayan?
olra i roma' i temo na vavayan?
ulra, ulra alrupe' i ki'edengan.
olra, olra alrope' i ki'edengan.
S.TRANSL: Yes, she’s sleeping in her room.

S.FORM: ulra i ruma' i temu na vavayan?
olra i roma' i temo na vavayan?
uniyan, mupacalan lra haremay, uwaruma' nu 'aremeng lra.
oniyan, mopacalan lra haremay, owaroma' no 'aremeng lra.
S.TRANSL: 不在，她剛出去了，要晚上才回家。
No, she’s not. She just went out and will be back in the evening.

S.FORM: ulra i ruma' i temu na ma'inay?
olra i roma' i temo na ma'inay?
ulra i icas kana ki'edengan uwa aya'u intaw.
olra i icas kana ki'edengan owa aya'o intaw.
S.TRANSL: 他在上面的房間，你上去找他吧。
He’s upstairs. You can go up and find him.

S.FORM: ulra cau i ruma'?
olra cao i roma'?
mau i Amsing kuwayu! sawaliyan ta lra adi marepana'u, 'inava u diya?
mao i Amsing kowayo! sawaliyan ta lra adi marepana'o, 'inava o diya?
S.TRANSL: 原來是Amsing阿，很久沒有看到你了，你還好嗎?
It’s Amsing. I haven’t seen you in a while! How have you been?

S.FORM: 'inava ku, duwa ku maya'a kannu kimadayar.
'inava ko, dowa ko maya'a kanno kimadayar.
S.TRANSL: I’m doing great! I came to chat with you.

S.FORM: ulra i iyan i temama?
olra i iyan i temama?
ulra i sawka semareser da kulang.
olra i sawka semareser da kolang.
S.TRANSL: 他在廚房炒菜，我去叫他。
He’s in the kitchen cooking. Let me go call him.

S.FORM: mukuwa i iyan i Muymuy?
mokowa i iyan i Moymoy?
mukuwa i puvuyuwan 'emvanga da vuyu.
mokowa i povoyowan 'emvanga da voyo.
S.TRANSL: She went to the chicken coop to catch chickens.

S.FORM: imu, duwa mi lra.
imo, dowa mi lra.
uniyan i temu, ulra i 'uma, ngarayu intaw kani a!
oniyan i temo, olra i 'oma, ngarayo intaw kani a!
S.TRANSL: 你們的爺爺不在，他在田裡，你們在這等他回來吧。
Your grandfather is not at home. He’s in the field. Wait for him to come back.

S.FORM: ama duwa u lra?
ama dowa o lra?
sawariyan ta lra adi mena'u kannu, tihasar u lra.
sawariyan ta lra adi mena'o kanno, tihasar o lra.
S.TRANSL: I haven’t seen you in a while. You’ve grown taller.

S.FORM: semangal ta mena'u kannu.
semangal ta mena'o kanno.
S.TRANSL: It’s so good to see you.

S.FORM: vaveray kannu ini na re'a, ca'ani i lralritekan.
vaveray kanno ini na re'a, ca'ani i lralritekan.
S.TRANSL: 這是給你們的鳳梨，要放到冰箱裡。
Here’s a pineapple for you. Put it in the refrigerator.

S.FORM: sawaliyan u lra adi duwa, kuwa su'uraw na rinuma'enan, mukasaya ta mekan.
sawaliyan o lra adi dowa, kowa so'oraw na rinoma'enan, mokasaya ta mekan.
S.TRANSL: 這麼久沒來，我來召集親戚，讓我們一起吃飯。
It’s been a while. Let’s have a meal together.

S.FORM: amana mavangavang, 'emau ku diya da 'a'awan maruwa lra, kayta i kalisuwasuwan madayara.
amana mavangavang, 'emao ko diya da 'a'awan marowa lra, kayta i kalisowasowan madayara.
S.TRANSL: 不用麻煩了，我喝茶就好，我們來客廳聊天。
No need to bother. I’ll just have tea. Let’s sit in the living room and chat.

S.FORM: semangalan lrayuwan kananu sinadaru, avuruk ku lra.
semangalan lrayowan kanano sinadaro, avorok ko lra.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝你的招待，我要回去了。
Thank you for your hospitality. I have to go now.

S.FORM: cinuwakan haremay ini na vuyu, adayu demeru.
cinowakan haremay ini na voyo, adayo demero.
S.TRANSL: 這隻雞剛殺好，帶回去煮。
This chicken was just freshly killed. Take it home and enjoy it slowly.

S.FORM: marekuret ta nu 'emanan piya ta kare'alri ay?
marekoret ta no 'emanan piya ta kare'alri ay?
S.TRANSL: 我和您約明天下午好嗎?
Can I make an appointment with you tomorrow afternoon?

S.FORM: ai, marepana'u ta i iyan?
ai, marepana'o ta i iyan?
'inava nu marekuret ta i kungkuwan ai? pasasirep ta data ikakuda.
'inava no marekoret ta i kongkowan ai? pasasirep ta data ikakoda.
S.TRANSL: 我們相約在學校好了，好嗎?我們要錄我們的一些事。
How about meeting at school? We need to shoot a video.

S.FORM: kayta i palakuwan nu kemadu, piyakacing ku mukuwa.
kayta i palakowan no kemado, piyakacing ko mokowa.
S.TRANSL: 那去聚會所好了，我會穿kacing去。
Then let’s go to the community center. I’ll wear folk costume.

S.FORM: nu muvakal tu 'apuc na sakula kaniyam i dekalr mu, pukasa kana vulay, nu adu kadika lra kaniyam ay?
no movakal to 'apoc na sakola kaniyam i dekalr mo, pokasa kana volay, no ado kadika lra kaniyam ay?
S.TRANSL: 當我們部落的櫻花盛開時，特別的漂亮，到那時候到我家好嗎?
The cherry blossoms in our tribe are beautiful when they bloom. Come find me when the flowers bloom!

S.FORM: di ngangala ta palru kana kaseveran, sawariyan dadu kema ku!
di ngangala ta palro kana kaseveran, sawariyan dado kema ko!
S.TRANSL: 那要等到春天，我認為太久了吧!
That would have to wait until spring. It’s too late, isn’t it?

S.FORM: nu kemadu mu, nu katikelruwanan mi mu, kadika lra aya'aw ku ay!
no kemado mo, no katikelrowanan mi mo, kadika lra aya'aw ko ay!
S.TRANSL: 那這樣的話，我們鞦韆祭的時候，再來找我吧!

S.FORM: ai! kasemangalan ku a!
ai! kasemangalan ko a!
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’m looking forward to it!

S.FORM: kiwmalra ku diya, man kemadu di muruma' u lra kikadu?
kiwmalra ko diya, man kemado di moroma' o lra kikado?
S.TRANSL: 請問一下，你為甚麼要搬回部落住?
May I ask why you decided to move back to the tribe?

S.FORM: maranger ku muruma' patakesi.
maranger ko moroma' patakesi.
S.TRANSL: I want to return to teach at the local school.

S.FORM: man kemadu di adi u lra muwai kikadu i tokay patakesi?
man kemado di adi o lra mowai kikado i tokay patakesi?
S.TRANSL: 是為甚麼你不願住在都市教書了?
Why not teach in the city?

S.FORM: alra sare'ed ku kanangku dekalr, di maranger ku paveriyas daku kinasayhu kanta dekalr.
alra sare'ed ko kanangko dekalr, di maranger ko paveriyas dako kinasayho kanta dekalr.
S.TRANSL: 因為我懷念我的故鄉，也希望能回饋部落。
Because I miss my hometown and I also want to give back to the tribe.

S.FORM: sayhu u temenun, i eman na panadam kannu?
sayho o temenon, i eman na panadam kanno?
S.TRANSL: 你很會織布，是誰教你的?
You’re very skilled at weaving, who taught you?

S.FORM: mau i mulri na vavayan, kanta i dekalr mau intaw na marasayhu temenun.
mao i molri na vavayan, kanta i dekalr mao intaw na marasayho temenon.
S.TRANSL: 是我的奶奶，在我們部落她是比較會織布的。
It was my grandmother, she is the most skilled weaver in our tribe.

S.FORM: man mianger u mukuwa kipanadama kana temenun?
man mianger o mokowa kipanadama kana temenon?
S.TRANSL: 你是怎麼有心去學織布的?
How did you develop an interest in learning weaving?

S.FORM: na temenun mau nanta temuwamuwan tu kakuwayanan a adiyu diya, maranger ku pulrepus kanini na kakuwayanan.
na temenon mao nanta temowamowan to kakowayanan a adiyo diya, maranger ko polrepos kanini na kakowayanan.
S.TRANSL: 織布是我們祖先的從前文化，我想要讓這文化延續。
Weaving is a part of our culture, and I want to ensure its continuity.

S.FORM: kasa imaran ini na tinavuwavu'.
kasa imaran ini na tinavowavo'.
mau ingku na temuvuwavu' mu!
mao ingko na temovowavo' mo!
pukasa u kana sayhu, karuwa pida wariyan temuvuwavu'?
pokasa o kana sayho, karowa pida wariyan temovowavo'?
S.TRANSL: You’re really talented. Does it take a long time to make?

S.FORM: adi sawariyan, aruwa saliyusan maruwa lra. ta deruwaw diya i lidingan na lrikecan, pulusu ta lra mu, ta pare'uliyaw kana pikak, karuwa lra puwa i savak kana ngelrulr.
adi sawariyan, arowa saliyosan marowa lra. ta derowaw diya i lidingan na lrikecan, poloso ta lra mo, ta pare'oliyaw kana pikak, karowa lra powa i savak kana ngelrolr.
S.TRANSL: 不會很久，大約一周就好了。先把糯米用蒸桶蒸熟，放下後再加入酒麴拌勻，就可以裝到甕裡了。
No, it only takes about a week. The glutinous rice is first steamed in a steamer, then mixed with the sake koji and put into an urn.

S.FORM: ulra eman nannu inaniwan?
olra eman nanno inaniwan?
ulra kaningku kamangulr di lakiw, mau nangku sinaleman peniya.
olra kaningko kamangolr di lakiw, mao nangko sinaleman peniya.
S.TRANSL: 我這裡有辣椒和蕗蕎，都是我自己種的喔!
I have chili and lokiy, both grown by myself!

S.FORM: pidaya paisu nadu na duwaya.
pidaya paiso nado na dowaya.
duwaya leman di makalruwac paisu.
dowaya leman di makalrowac paiso.
sahar ku kanini na kavang, pidaya paisu?
sahar ko kanini na kavang, pidaya paiso?
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡這件衣服，多少錢?
I like this piece of clothing. How much is it?

S.FORM: lruwaca leman paisu ini.
lrowaca leman paiso ini.
padangal dadu, adi karuwa pulusulusu?
padangal dado, adi karowa polosoloso?
S.TRANSL: 太貴了，不能降低一些嗎?
It’s too expensive. Can’t you lower the price a bit?

S.FORM: adi karuwa, kasipun ku nu pulusulusu.
adi karowa, kasipon ko no polosoloso.
S.TRANSL: No, if I lower it further, I’ll lose money.

S.FORM: ai nu kemadu! 'aylra saya a 'ude'udem na kavang.
ai no kemado! 'aylra saya a 'ode'odem na kavang.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!那給我一件黑色的衣服。
Alright then, I’ll take a black piece of clothing.

S.FORM: 'aylra kanini na kamuc di siwi.
'aylra kanini na kamoc di siwi.
S.TRANSL: 給我這把小刀和這個鍋子。
I want this knife and this pot.

S.FORM: duwaya kudulr paisu peniya, mau nangku dinaway ini a! tatena' karuwa sawariyan pieman.
dowaya kodolr paiso peniya, mao nangko dinaway ini a! tatena' karowa sawariyan pieman.
S.TRANSL: 總共2000元，這是我自己手工打造的，真的能夠使用很久。
It’s a total of 2000 dollars. I handmade these, and they are guaranteed to last a long time.

S.FORM: nu ku adayaw nangku 'aliyan duwa cimima'a, karuwa u pulusu datu cima'?
no ko adayaw nangko 'aliyan dowa cimima'a, karowa o poloso dato cima'?
S.TRANSL: 如果我帶朋友過來買，可以降價嗎?
If I bring friends over to buy, can the price be reduced?

S.FORM: ai! kunu rehecay da duwaya leman paisu nu kemadu!
ai! kono rehecay da dowaya leman paiso no kemado!
S.TRANSL: 好啦!讓我幫你扣去兩百元吧!
Alright! Let me deduct two hundred for you!

S.FORM: kadika na'uwi! menaniwan mi da kavang di na talupung.
kadika na'owi! menaniwan mi da kavang di na talopong.
S.TRANSL: 來看看喔!我們衣服帽子都有賣。
Come and take a look! We sell clothes and hats.

S.FORM: kiwmalra ku diya pidaya paisu na kavang?
kiwmalra ko diya pidaya paiso na kavang?
na kavang saya mu, telu leman di makalruwac paisu, tuluwa mu, sakudulr paisu.
na kavang saya mo, telo leman di makalrowac paiso, tolowa mo, sakodolr paiso.
S.TRANSL: One piece of clothing is 350 dollars, three pieces for 1000 dollars.

S.FORM: cacima' ku saya maruwa lra, 'aylra kanidu na vekaran.
cacima' ko saya marowa lra, 'aylra kanido na vekaran.
S.TRANSL: 我要買一件就好，請給我新型的。
I’ll just buy one piece, please give me a new one.

S.FORM: 'inavayan! cacima' ku da kinavelas di lramumu di na tinenger na tiwngan.
'inavayan! cacima' ko da kinavelas di lramomo di na tinenger na tiwngan.
S.TRANSL: 你好，我想要買糯米飯和圓葉山胡椒及滷肉。
Hello, I would like to buy sticky rice,mountain Litsea and braised pork.

S.FORM: yi! mucima' lra na kinavelas peniya, ulra diya na congyupin cacima' u?
yi! mocima' lra na kinavelas peniya, olra diya na congyopin cacima' o?
S.TRANSL: 哇!糯米飯全賣完了。我還有蔥油餅，你要買嗎?
The rice is sold out. I have scallion pancake, would you like to buy some?

S.FORM: ai! 'aylra diya saya nu kemadu, cimima'a ku lra nu masalr lra.
ai! 'aylra diya saya no kemado, cimima'a ko lra no masalr lra.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!請給我一份，我下次再來買飯。
Alright, please give me one. I’ll come back next time to buy rice.

S.FORM: ai, kunu cavuwaw kana 'aliyuc, kemani mu, makalruwac paisu.
ai, kono cavowaw kana 'aliyoc, kemani mo, makalrowac paiso.
S.TRANSL: W：好，我幫你用袋子裝起來，這樣50元。
Okay, I’ll pack it in a bag for you. That’ll be 50 dollars.
